    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int answerEmotionId
      answerEmotionId:机器人当前问句回复句情感值
      java.lang.String coreference
      coreference:当前问句的指代对象，me:主人，you：机器人，other：其他
      int robotEmotion
      robotEmotion:机器人的累计情感值
      int robotp
      robotp:机器人交互累加的熟悉度值+ p/-p (-50~+50)
      int sentenceEmotion
      sentenceEmotion:当前问句的情感值
      int sentencep
      sentencep:当前问句的熟悉度+ p/-p (-50~+50)
